subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jiri Tlusty scored two goals in the third period and Cam Ward made 26 saves as the Carolina Hurricanes beat the Devils, 4-2, in Newark to end the hosts’ five-game winning streak.
snippet: Jiri Tlusty scored two goals in the third period and Cam Ward made 26 saves as the Carolina Hurricanes beat the Devils, 4-2, in Newark to end the hosts’ five-game winning streak.
